short.fr: Ce plugin fournit la possibilité d'intégrer un processus (workflow) aux objets ITIL (Tickets, Changements et Problèmes).
short.en: This plugin provides a process (workflow) management linked to ITIL objects (Tickets, Changes and Problems).

long.en: This plugin is dedicated to provide process (workflows) management linked to ITIL objects (Tickets, Changes and Problems). This goal is achieved using a customized ProcessMaker server (URL: https://github.com/tomolimo/processmaker-server). ProcessMaker provides BPMN Process design and execution. This plugin is the glue between GLPI and ProcessMaker.
long.fr: Ce plugin est dédié à la gestion de processus (workflows) liés aux objets ITIL (Tickets, Changements et Problèmes). Ce but est atteint par l'utilisation d'un serveur ProcessMaker customisé (URL: https://github.com/tomolimo/processmaker-server). ProcessMaker fournit un outil graphique de création de processus BPMN et permet l'exécution de ceux-ci. Ce plugin sert de glue entre GLPI et ProcessMaker.
